ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm well for comparison here are my prices (which people bitch about, i swear i could give them the stuff and they would still whine that they didn t get a
ygData.messageBody:
hmm well for comparison here are my prices (which people bitch about, i
swear i could give them the stuff and they would still whine that they
didn't get a bracer with it)
Gorget, and bracer 5pp each ( which I dont make except for "large"
orders, i.e. making a bunch of other stuff for them too.)
Tunic 20pp
Cloak 25pp
leggings 20pp
mantle and sleeves 15pp each
all else 12pp
/nos
Lemac Justerian wrote:
>
> From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
> > From: "Dennis Meek" <dmeek01@...>
> >
> > Your model is wrong. Ore, free? What the hell are you thinking? First,
> > it's free if you kill a creature that drops it (not worth time). Second,
> > ore isn't needed for making armor.
>
> No, but it CAN be used for making metal sheets... but your correct, not
> worth it really (those blocks of ore are 15lbs!! Try carrying a few of
> those and running through a dangerous area!)
>
> > Now, as for molds. Since you used a tunic in your letter, I will use it
> as
> > well. A Tunic molds costs over 1pp. It requires 3 metal sheets, all of
> > which also cost over 1pp. Then the water, at a palsy 1sp or so.
> > I sell my tunics at 17pp. I consider this a fair price, and many else
> have
> > agreed with me (as I have sold many many many for this price). How can
> you
> > say it's a bit steep? It is MY choice to sell for the price that I see
> fit.
> > It is not up to you to decide how much I feel my time is worth.
>
> Might be a 'fair' price to the BUYER, yes... but not necessarily fair to the
> rest of the smiths... You still forget about the failures and practice you
> have to put in... Don't just base it all on the AMOUNT either... Take into
> consideration all the TIME it took you to learn to smith... those endless
> hours and hours at the hot forge making those little metal bits and
> skewers... the traveling around you had to do to get all the items and head
> back to the forge... the waiting in LINE at the forge (In some cases) ...
> So, remember the TIME as well as your cost in platinum that it took you to
> learn it! After all, you could have made lots of money out killing mobs AND
> gotten experience at the same time!
>
> I try to sell my Tunics for 20 (when I can make them) and I WISH I could
> sell them for more! They are easily worth twice that!
>
> > On any account, there will (for the most part) always be a flow, if not
> > constant, for banded. Seeing as how new people begin the game, or old
> > people create new characters (that are not always twinked mind you), we
> will
> > have other's to sell to.
>
> Oh wrong again my friend... what happens when there is too much of a 'good'
> thing? And believe me, there will be... When I first logged on in this game
> (about 2 weeks after it 'officially' started), people were selling banded
> armor for TWICE the prices they are now (and more!) and I would see messages
> all the time of "Banded Wanted"...
>
> Now look at it from the economic side of things... Now there is PLENTY of
> banded armor out there from all the smiths, and prices are MUCH cheaper!
> Don't think that other newbies are not starting up as new smiths too! They
> are! and it is a little bit easier for them too because of the 'limited'
> fixes Verant has done for the beginning smith...
>
> But what happens when you have 1500 players on a server (at any one time)
> and there are 1000 sets of banded armor and another 500 sets of Bronze
> Plate, Rubicite and other kinds? Oh and least we forget that those 1000
> that don't have those 'higher' forms of armor WILL be getting them also
> sooner or later... What happens is that banded armor becomes as worthless as
> Studded and Reinforced already is...
>
> Look at the prices for Bronze plate already! People selling PLATE ARMOR for
> less than 20plat per piece? That is rediculous! but hey, they can because
> it is soooo easy to get nowadays... So many smiths have to sell their stuff
> cheaper too... otherwise the buyers just want to wait until they can get the
> Plate... They know the prices are coming down too...
>
> So, it will end up like Studded and Reinforced armor has... Useless.... It
> is only a matter of time... Of course by then we should all be making
> plate! But that will come with the same strings attached!
>
> Remember one thing about smithing if you remember anything at all... It
> costs more than MATERIALS to make an item! It costs you TIME too!
>
> Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
> Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com
>
